entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 07:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -30.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -33.7°C
Wind: E 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 29 except high minus 34 near the Ogilvie mountains.
entry.summary: Clear. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Ice fog patches. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 29 except high minus 34 near the Ogilvie mountains. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 32 except low minus 45 near the Ogilvie mountains.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains.
